alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 14 at 7:27PM EDT until July 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by runoff from excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of central New York, including the following county, Delaware. * WHEN...Until 830 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 725 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated that the heavy rain due to thunderstorms has moved to the south of the advisory area. Runoff continues from the previous heavy rains and is leading road wash outs and minor flooding in poor drainage and low-lying areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Delhi, Meredith, Stamford, Hobart, Meridale, Kortright and East Delhi. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
